title: Pre-Course Day 3
message:
# Primitives v. Complex
**Primitives** (immutable) *passed by value*
* String
* null
* NaN
* undefined
* Number
* Boolean

**Complex** *passed by reference*
* Function
* Object
* Array

# Value by Reference
```
var myArray = [2, 3, 4, 5];
var ourArray = myArray;
ourArray[2] = 25;
console.log(myArray);
```
```
Console
[2, 3, 25, 5]
```
